meaningMnemonic: A <radical>leader</radical> puts their <radical>hat</radical> on the <radical>ground</radical> next to a <radical>bookshelf</radical>. This is a test in <kanji>ethics</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: To test your <kanji>ethics</kanji> even more, the leader puts down a <reading>rin</reading>g (りん) as well.
